title: CORA Request – Bodycam, Dashcam, and In-Car Video – Maya Dumas Arrest (July 16, 2024)

communications.subject: Colorado Open Records Act Request: CORA Request – Bodycam, Dashcam, and In-Car Video – Maya Dumas Arrest (July 16, 2024)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I respectfully request the following records related to the arrest of Maya Dumas (age 25) on July 16, 2024, in Trinidad, Colorado (ZIP 81082):

Body-worn camera footage from all Trinidad Police Department officers who responded to the disturbance call and made contact with Ms. Dumas.

Dashcam footage from any patrol vehicle present at or near the scene, documenting arrival, on-scene interaction, or surrounding context.

Rear seat in-car camera footage, if Ms. Dumas was transported in a patrol unit.

This request is limited to the timeframe of officer arrival through arrest and transport, and pertains only to the incident involving Ms. Dumas’s arrest on charges of:

Harassment (Insults or Taunts Likely to Provoke a Violent Response)

Third Degree Criminal Trespass

Disorderly Conduct

If redactions are necessary, I consent to the release of all non-exempt portions. If any of the requested video is denied, please provide the legal justification and cite the applicable exemption.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News
